attributes.additional_details:
since Harwich bus station closed in December buses have been late or have not run at all.

If they do run the 103/104 only drops people off at the top of East Hill in Colchester as they have to refuel for the next journey, That is no good if people who need a bus connection from the bus station!

The aim of this petition is to get Harwich bus station reopened or an improved service what is reliable!
